title: @Riot, What champions from league has Ezreal canonically met in his travels?
body:
I love word-wide adventurer and wanderer-esque champions, it always makes me wonder about how they probably know more champions in the League universe than any other. So apart for the Piltovians and Zaunites, who does Ezreal know from across the lands?

I would make one guess, that being: {{champion:24}} Because Jax is also a wanderer and they both seem to have spent a lot of time in Shurima.

replies.body: Hello Faux, wanted to know, I read somewhere that you really wnated to rework Ezreal, is that truth? Can I know why?

> [{quoted}](name=NegaRed,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=6P6qVxE5,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2018-10-02T01:12:49.550+0000)
>
> Hello Faux, wanted to know, I read somewhere that you really wnated to rework Ezreal, is that truth? Can I know why?

Ezreal was a character that I felt had a lot of storytelling potential with a largely untapped personality rich with flaws and strengths. He struck me as  like a young Starlord with delusions of grandeur and something to prove, and a lot of growing up to do. There was something about his overconfidence that seemed to cover a lot of wounds he'd never admit to having -- the way his gauntlet does all the work for him, despite Ezreal's clear talent... he lacked a desire to do the hard work despite being totally capable of it. Ezreal wants to see and do so much that he's willing to take shortcuts and write consequences off as natural collateral damage. I dunno, that's really fun to me. It resonated with me. I have so many Ezreal stories that I've pitched and hope to get to tell, if Riot's will allow me to. I've always loved adventure seekers, relic hunters, mystery-solvers... they want to believe in something more ancient than themselves to cover a present they can't face.
Would he get google-eyed like Santangelo did if he ran into Ahri? XD
I think that Ezreal has met almost as many champions as Ryze. Certainly quite a few in his travels, but there's a lot more Ezreal has to explore.

I wonder about this, how far can he teleport with his gauntlet, can he use I to help him drastically cut down travel time?

Because it's supposed to take a real long time to cross valoran. Makes me ask questions like, how long ago did he find the glove, how old is he and how old was he when he started searching for his parents, found the gauntlet, etc etc
